title.value: Современное состояние производства кукурузы на зерно и силос в Гродненской области [Беларусь]
Modern condition of corn manufacture on grain and a silo in the Grodno district [Belarus]
Modern condition of corn manufacture on grain and a silo in the Grodno district [Belarus]

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Ushkevich, A.M., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: In article the current state of production of corn (Zea mays) ащк grain and a silo in the agricultural enterprises of the Grodno area (the Republic of Belarus) is considered. In view of nature-climatic features and on the basis of the received data it is possible to allocate 3 regions of corn manufacture in the Grodno area: southwest, central-east and northern. There are the highest productive and economic parameters in the facilities of southwest region. As the main indicators gross collecting, a cultivated area and productivity are taken. All of them are considered in dynamics with the analysis of the reached level. The increase in volumes of manufacture on corn on a silo is marked in 5,5 times at crops increase in 3,7 times for last 17 years in the Grodno area. Productivity in 2011 has made 358 c/hectares. On corn on grain in the Grodno area for the researched period sharp increase of its crops (in 96 times) is marked. The common manufacture for last 17 years has increase in 700 times. Appreciably it has happened due to increase of productivity which in 2011 has made 76,2 c/hectares
